content.raw: Good point. Coincidentally though, I *think* in that case we want to check exactly against all zeroes, because that's the default value of the color `ConfigWidget`. Those checks are making sure we only send color messages if the user has modified values in the widget (and we're making it impossible to set to transparent black in the process, a different problem).
